body_html:
Dot-slash workaround does not work for checkpoints that re not in the current directory. Neither /path/to/./my-model nor ./path/to/my-model.
Is there a workaround for that one? ;)

P.S. tested with the latest as of now commit fe70bd9 at r0.12 branch
body_text:
Dot-slash workaround does not work for checkpoints that re not in the current directory. Neither /path/to/./my-model  nor ./path/to/my-model.
Is there a workaround for that one? ;)
P.S. tested with the latest as of now commit fe70bd9 at r0.12 branch
body:
Dot-slash workaround does not work for checkpoints that re not in the current directory. Neither `/path/to/./my-model`  nor `./path/to/my-model`.
Is there a workaround for that one? ;)

P.S. tested with the latest as of now commit fe70bd9c22357741e69751bdf189726c440db02e at r0.12 branch
